item.title: bk2-ref
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: bk2-ref|BK2 Gene Name: Brittle stalk 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: A spontaneous maize mutant, brittle stalk-2 (bk2-ref|BK2), exhibits dramatically reduced tissue mechanical strength.

item.title: CmERF12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmERF12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum embryo development is negatively affected by a novel ERF transcription factor, CmERF12。 CmERF12 negatively affects chrysanthemum embryo development.

item.title: CmLEC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CL4474.Contig1 Gene Symbol: CmLEC1 Gene Name: LEAFY COTYLEDON1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CmLEC1 positively regulates the seed-setting rate in hybridization breeding of chrysanthemum.

item.title: GhGLU19A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A04G0109 Gene Symbol: GhGLU19A Gene Name: Glucanase 19 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of GhGLU19 encoding β-1,3-glucanase promotes seed germination in cotton.

item.title: GmMIPS-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmMIPS-1|GmMIPS1 Gene Name: myo-inositol-3-phosphate synthase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Localization of myo-inositol phosphate synthase (GmMIPS-1|GmMIPS1) during the early stages of soybean seed development.

item.title: GmSWEET10b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G183500 Gene Symbol: GmSWEET10b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Simultaneous changes in seed size, oil content and protein content driven by selection of SWEET homologues during soybean domestication.

item.title: KASI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G084300 Gene Symbol: KASI Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: KASI is a core fatty acid synthesis enzyme that is involved in the conversion of sucrose into oil in developing seeds.

item.title: MtSERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtSERF1 Gene Name: SOMATIC EMBRYO RELATED FACTOR1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor MtSERF1 of the ERF subfamily identified by transcriptional profiling is required for somatic embryogenesis induced by auxin plus cytokinin in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: NtGNL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtGNL1 Gene Name: GNOM-like 1 protein Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtGNL1 is involved in embryonic cell division patterning, root elongation, and pollen tube growth in tobacco.

item.title: NtKRP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtKRP Gene Name: kinesin-related protein Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Ribosomal protein NtRPL17 interacts with kinesin-12 family protein NtKRP and functions in the regulation of embryo/seed size and radicle growth.

item.title: NtRPL17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtRPL17 Gene Name: 60S ribosomal protein L17 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Ribosomal protein NtRPL17 interacts with kinesin-12 family protein NtKRP and functions in the regulation of embryo/seed size and radicle growth.

item.title: PrCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PrCYP707A1 Gene Name: ABA 8’-hydroxylase CYP707A1 Genome: Species: Phelipanche ramosa Functional Descriptions: PrCYP707A1, an ABA catabolic gene, is a key component of Phelipanche ramosa seed germination in response to the strigolactone analogue GR24.

item.title: Pta1-MMP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pta1-MMP Gene Name: matrix metalloproteinase 1 Genome: Species: Pinus taeda Functional Descriptions: Pta1-MMP protein has the structural characteristics of other plant MMPs, the recombinant protein exhibits Zn2+-dependent protease activity, and is inhibited by EDTA and the active site-binding hydroxamate inhibitor GM6001.
